channel.title: Looking to make a server with someone
channel.description: Hey guys, i am looking for someone that has experience in this subject. Someone that can teach me how to do code. You do not have to spill out every piece of knowledge you have to me but teach me the basics. I want to make a server and actually code it and get it running and get some people on it. If you want to be serious and actually make this a fully grown working and ready to go server by all means. But if you just want to do this for the heck of coding and see what we can make out of it then be my guest. Shoot me a pm or simply comment here. I AM A QUICK LEARNER AND CAN CATCH ONTO THINGS QUICKLY. Thanks guys. :D

item.title: Looking to make a server with someone
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Belongs in Development teams. It would probably get locked there anyway because you can’t request hosts/coders on this site, but you can recruit a dev team.

plogangsta:

I like to have a partner through something. This post is not just to learn how to code but to actually create a server with someone.

Then put it in the right section. I like how you won’t even accept his advice, he’s telling you strait out that it’s more than likely going to get locked so I don’t see what’s so bad about warning you that you should move it. And literary almost every project is to learn more about programming, even if it’s not Java specifically.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to make a server with someone
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

plogangsta:

What’s so wrong with doing it with someone else and having a partner. Unnecessary post.

There’s nothing wrong with doing that. I was just pointing out that you’ve posted this in the wrong section. Also, you should make an attempt to learn the BASICS yourself.

Read full topic
